entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:13 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 08:50 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
